ing: 1 (3 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (2.25 ounce) package cinnamon red hot candies
des: "My ex-husband's aunt made this unusual salad. She didn't follow a recipe, but we came up with this conversion."
ins: In a small serving bowl, mix together the gelatin and boiling water until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cinnamon candies until melted, then mix in the applesauce. Chill until set, about 3 hours.
